name: Delve
description: Delve is an esoteric adventure-RPG that combines a mind-bending journey with classic, satisfying JRPG combat. Explore Esoteria, a fantastical world of floating islands, and outwit the killer that stalks your every move from the shadows...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1.0 Ghz Storage: 430 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Storage: 1 GB available space
